path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - FundGo ETF Smartcontracts - v1.0.pdf

findings.title: FUND IN CONTRACT CAN BE DRAINED
findings.description: The publisher can drain contract funds by calling listP2P() and sellNow() functions.

findings.title: Publisher can take advantage of listP2P() and sellNow() to drain contract funds
findings.description: The publisher can exploit listP2P() and sellNow() functions to drain contract funds by selling tokens at zero price and later redeeming them for payment tokens.

findings.title: CONTRACT LOGIC CAN BE DISRUPTED BY SOME FUNCTIONS
findings.description: Contract logic can be disrupted by some functions

findings.title: INCORRECT CHECK FOR ORDER ITEM IN DELISTINGP2P FUNCTION
findings.description: The conditional statement to check for the existence of the order is incorrect in the deListingP2P function. The condition orderId > 0 should be replaced with currentUserItem.orderId > 0.

findings.title: INCONSISTENT PRICES WHEN SELLING TOKENS WITH SELLNOW FUNCTION
findings.description: Users may lose money when holding tokens for more than one intervest term due to inconsistent prices calculated by the getPriceWhenSellNow function.

findings.title: LENGTH OF INPUT ARRAYS SHOULD BE EQUAL
findings.description: The length of tokenIds and amounts arrays should be equal in the functions sellNow, listP2P, and redeem.

findings.title: EVENT MISSING INDEXED FIELDS
findings.description: Some events are missing indexed fields, which can lead to increased gas usage.

findings.title: Payment Date Can Be Controlled By Users
findings.description: The payment date can be controlled by users which may lead to potential security issues.

findings.title: INCORRECT VALUE FOR UNITTIME
findings.description: The current value of unitTime is set to 1 minute, which will produce incorrect results when calculating numberDays in the getPriceAtTime function.
